articles.author: By  REUTERS
articles.title: Australian surfer feared dead after shark attack, police say - The Jerusalem Post
articles.description: A surfer is feared dead after being attacked by a shark in shallow water on a remote beach in Western Australi
articles.content:
A surfer is feared dead after being attacked by a shark in shallow water on a remote beach in Western Australia, police said on Tuesday.
A 30-year-old man from Melbourne was reported missing on Mond… [+618 chars]
